recipe.ingredients: 6 large eggs, 1/4 cup skim milk, 1/2 cup diced bell peppers, 1/2 cup diced onions, 1 cup chopped spinach, 1/2 cup chopped mushrooms, 1/4 cup crumbled feta cheese, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper, 2 tablespoons olive oil
recipe.directions: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). In a large mixing bowl, whisk together eggs, milk, salt, and pepper until well combined. Stir in bell peppers, onions, spinach, mushrooms, and feta cheese. Heat olive oil in a 10-inch oven-safe skillet over medium heat. Add the egg mixture to the skillet and cook for 5-7 minutes until the edges begin to firm up. Transfer the skillet to the preheated oven and bake for 15-20 minutes, or until the frittata is fully set and the top is lightly golden. Remove from oven, let it cool for a few minutes, then slice and serve.
recipe.nutrition: Calories 150, Total fat 10g, Protein 12g, Cholesterol 190mg, Total carbohydrate 4g, Dietary fiber 1g, Monounsaturated fat 5g, Saturated fat 3g, Added sugars 0g, Sodium 220mg, Potassium 200mg, Total sugars 2g
